name: EAV Pro Audio & Video
overview:
EAV Pro Audio stock a wide range of PA Speakers, Mixing desks, PA Power amps, Wireless microphones and vocal microphones along with a massive range of home and professional recording equipment. Pro audio equipment for the stage or the studio. EAV stock a massive range of products from PA speakers to mixing desks and from power amplifiers to wireless microphones. EAV is the e-commerce/mail order division of the well respected installation, sales and hire business Acoustic Arrangements with over 18 years working at the cutting edge of pro-audio, video and lighting.

EAV offers everything from amplifiers and mixing desks to microphones and outboards, from all the leading manufacturers and all at great prices.

New products and special offers are added to the site regularly, so be sure to visit regularly in order not to miss out on a bargain!

EAV Online offers all the security and peace of mind you need when purchasing over the internet. Our secure server using SSL ensures that your credit card details will never fall into the wrong hands. Orders can be paid for, not only by credit/debit card, but also by bank transfer, cheque and also online finance EAV are members of the Coventry & Warwickshire Chamber of Commerce and of the UK Trades Confederation.
